name: Quiche Lorraine
author: M.E.

ingredients.name: c. (7 oz.) Swiss cheese, natural, coarsely shredded

instructions: Bake pastry shell at 425Â° until lightly browned. Cool. Fry bacon until crisp, let cool, crumble. Saute mushrooms. Place bacon into pas- try shell. Sprinkle cheese and mushrooms over the bacon. Mix season- ings and sprinkle over cheese. Beat eggs and half-and-half together. Pour over cheese and bacon. Bake 45 minutes or until lightly browned and knife inserted into the center comes out clean.
